}}\margl1440\margr1440\margt540\margb1440\headery540\footery720\formshade\sectd\marglsxn1440\margrsxn1440\margtsxn540\margbsxn1440\headery540\footery720\sbkpage\pgncont\plain\plain\fs20\pard\plain\fs20\cf0\fs24\sscharaux1\b Phone Note \fs20\b0\par\b\par Call patient back at:\par\b0 Other: xxx-815-8615\par\fs24\b\par CALL FROM PATIENT\par\fs20 Caller Name: \b0xxxx-xxxxs\par\b Caller: \b0 Spouse\par\par\fs24\b Other \fs20\b0\par\par Requesting a letter stating that pt is indeed a patient of Dr xxxx-xxxxm and was seen last on 06/25/2013. Pt says the IRS is giving a deadline of 05/22/2015.\par\par Please show pt's home address in the letter as: \par\par Tom Eilers\par 415 Lakeview Rd\par Newland NC, 28657\par\par But please mail this letter to:\par\par Tom Eilers\par PO BOX 7371 \par Myrtle Beach, SC \par 29572\par\par\b Call Taken by: \b0 xxxx-xxxx ,  May 13, 2015 4:07 PM\par\par\fs24\b RNA Follow-up\fs20\b0\par\b Follow-up Details: \b0 Left vm for pt's sp at CB # listed (okay per HIPAA) informing of msg rec'd and asked to call back to discuss further for add'l info. Left RNA number for call back. \par\b Action Taken: \b0 Phone Call Completed\par\b Follow-up by: \b0 Tisha Walker RN,  May 14, 2015 10:04 AM\par\par\fs24\b RNA Follow-up\fs20\b0\par\b Additional Follow-up Details: \b0 Rec'd RC from pt's wife Linda stating letter is being requested d/t her having to take care of her husband (pt) in 2012 and 2013 d/t issues of dementia, heart attack, appendecitis, etc. She was late filing her taxes and received penalties from IRS. Now IRS is telling her if she can get letters from physicians they can excuse penalties. \par Pt saw BJR 2013 (referred by Laura Brown, ENT) and dx w/ PD(?). She is requesting letter to confirm ",MISCELLANEOUS,"SHARING OF HEALTH RECORDS (FAX, E-MAIL, ETC.)",No,2015_5_6137_1001

}}\margl1440\margr1440\margt540\margb1440\headery540\footery720\formshade\sectd\marglsxn1440\margrsxn1440\margtsxn540\margbsxn1440\headery540\footery720\sbkpage\pgncont\plain\plain\fs20\pard\plain\fs20\cf0\fs24\sscharaux1\b Phone Note \fs20\b0\par\b\par Call patient back at:\par\b0 Cell Phonexxxx-xxxx\par\fs24\b\par CALL FROM PATIENT\par\fs20 Caller Name: \b0xxxx-xxxx\b Caller: \b0 Mom\par\par\fs24\b Appointments \fs20\b0\par Pt mom wants to know if pt should be seen for testing or if he can just come in and be evaluated by Dr. xxxx-xxxx. Says pt recently had a concussion and was already dx w/ concussion but mom is wanting to know why pt is more prone than others to getting a concussion when he has a head injury. Last OV 09-10-13.\par\b Call Taken by: \b0 xxxx-xxxx ,  May 28, 2015 12:06 PM\par\par\fs24\b RNA Follow-up\fs20\b0\par\b Follow-up Details: \b0 He had concussion 2 months ago at school and was diagnosed by his PCP.  He is having issues in school and also behavioral issues.  He also went head to head with another kid today playing soccer. at school.  Mom is very concerned about the patient getting concussions so easily.  I talked with her about concussions in general and answered all of her questions.  We made an appt for 6/2 at 1015 with a 10 arrival time.\par\b Action Taken: \b0 Phone Call Completed, Appt Scheduled, Called other family member\par Caller verbalized understanding of instructions\par\b Follow-up by: \b0 Mike Hales,  May 28, 2015 1:48 PM\par\cf3\sscharaux00\par\plain\fs20\par\cf3\par}",APPOINTMENTS,QUERY ON CURRENT APPOINTMENT,No,2015_5_6140_1001

column1: 2015561411001,dizzy & double vision past 45 mins after CT,"xxxx-xxxx\f0 \fswiss Arial
column10: }}\margl1440\margr1440\margt540\margb1440\headery540\footery720\formshade\sectd\marglsxn1440\margrsxn1440\margtsxn540\margbsxn1440\headery540\footery720\sbkpage\pgncont\plain\plain\fs20\pard\plain\fs20\cf0\fs24\sscharaux1\b Phone Note \fs20\b0\par\b\par Call patient back at:\par\b0 Home Phonexxxx-xxxx\par\fs24\b\par CALL FROM PATIENT\par\fs20\b0\par\fs24\b Other \fs20\b0\par had CT this a.m. in Smithfield and is feeling funny, had to get friend to pick her up because she couldn't drive and hos wouldn't let her leave without a driver, is home now, seeing double, happened when pt went from laying down to sitting on the CT table, hasn't stopped yet and it's been 45 mins, dizziness too, no contrast, no meds this a.m.\par\b Call Taken by: \b0 xxxx-xxxx ,  May 19, 2015 10:41 AM\par\b Follow-up Details: \b0 Please advise\par\b Follow-up by: \b0 Denny Cook RN ,  May 19, 2015 10:53 AM\par\b Additional Follow-up Details: \b0 Go to ER if symptoms persist. KMC\par\b Additional Follow-up by: \b0xxxx-xxxx MD,  May 19, 2015 4:31 PM\par\b Additional Follow-up Details: \b0 She is feeling better now but it really scared her. She said it was very upsetting. I explained that the crystals in her middle ear can sometimes get out of wack and that can make you feel very strange and tired. She said that something like this has happened before in the past but not to this extent. Since she is doing better now she will stay home but if it happens again she will go to ER. \par\b Action Taken: \b0 Phone Call Completed\par\b Follow-up by: \b0 Denny Cook RN ,  May 19, 2015 4:44 PM\par\plain\fs20\par\cf3\par\plain\fs20\par}",ASK_A_DOCTOR,SYMPTOMS,No,2015_5_6141_1001

If he has gained weight or symptoms have worsened, I would recommend repeat sleep study to see if he now has OSA.\par\b Follow-up by: \b0 Gina Mauldin PA,  May 22, 2015 11:55 AM\par\par\fs24\b RNA Follow-up\fs20\b0\par\b Additional Follow-up Details: \b0 Called pt. This would be the third concussion in 2 years. \par\b Call Taken by: \b0 xxxx-xxxx ,  May  7, 2015 8:22 AM\par\b Follow-up Details: \b0 I talked with mom and told her to let the patient rest today and through the weekend and we would see her on Monday.
